usage_rules.gradients: NO full-screen gradients. Use subtle radial gradients for 'glow' effects behind cards.
usage_rules.borders: Use 1px borders with 10-20% opacity for structure. Active elements get 100% opacity primary color border.
usage_rules.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with bg-black/60 for sticky headers and modals.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture (opacity 0.03) over the entire app background to reduce digital flatness.

borders.tracing_beam: Animate a gradient border around active test cards.
borders.tech_lines: Use 1px dashed lines (border-dashed) to connect related data points.

dashboard.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6
dashboard.rules: Dense packing. No jagged bottoms. Use col-span-2 for main charts.

marketing.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 md:gap-12 p-6 md:p-12
marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Leave empty cells for breathing room.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.4)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(59,130,246,0.6)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-md px-6 py-3 font-medium border border-white/10

cards.base: bg-surface border border-border rounded-xl p-6 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-11

status_badges.success: bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-500 border border-emerald-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase
status_badges.failure: bg-red-500/10 text-red-500 border border-red-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase
status_badges.running: bg-amber-500/10 text-amber-500 border border-amber-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase animate-pulse

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click. Links have a sliding underline effect.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-gray-400 is only used on dark backgrounds if it meets 4.5:1. Use text-gray-300 for better safety.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2 ring-offset-black on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center align the app container.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
Use named exports for components, default exports for pages.
Dark mode is the default and primary experience.

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'framer-motion' and 'sonner'. Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: Implement the 'Control Room' layout for the dashboard immediately. Do not use a sidebar that looks like a generic admin template; make it look like a tool palette.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Dark Control Room' aesthetic (remove rounded-lg, go for rounded-md or rounded-sm for a sharper tech feel).

pages.landing: Use the 'Tetris Grid' layout. Hero section should use the 'abstract_network' image with a heavy overlay.
pages.dashboard: Use the 'Bento Grid'. Status cards must be the focal point.
pages.project_detail: Video player must look like a CCTV feed or debug terminal.
